body: : At 15th level, you gain a burrow speed of 30 feet. Additionally, as long as you are surrounded by at least 5 feet of dirt or natural stone on all sides, you gain fast healing 10. You can heal a number of hit points per day equal to 10 × your sorcerer level with this ability.
name: Earth Crawler
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Ghouls/New Rules/Ghoul Sorcerer Bloodline/Ghoul/Bloodline Powers/Earth Crawler
